original_text: To open their eyes, and to turn them from darkness to light, and from the power of Satan unto God, that they may receive forgiveness of sins, and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me.
korean_text: 그 눈을 뜨게 하여 어둠에서 빛으로, 사탄의 권세에서 하나님께로 돌아오게 하고 죄 사함과 나를 믿어 거룩하게 된 무리 가운데서 기업을 얻게 하리라 하더이다

sentences.original_text: and to turn them from darkness to light
and from the power of Satan unto God
that they may receive forgiveness of sins
and inheritance among them which are sanctified
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 거룩하게 된 자들 가운데서 기업을 받게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: by faith that is in me
